content: this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free version of this crochet pattern **if you re also interested in my other criss cross stitch crochet patterns you can purchase the pdf files for all of them together in my criss cross stitch bundle /patterns/sources/criss-cross-stitch-bundle the pdf pattern includes written instructions with a photo tutorial of the stitches/instructions to help you along the way if needed this pattern is intermediate-beginner friendly but it is also a fun pattern for more experienced crocheters materials needed * worsted weight yarn you can use any worsted-weight yarn for this project i used red heart super saver stripes to get the rainbow effect but this ear warmer also looks great in solid colors * 5 5 mm crochet hook you may have to go up or down a hook size depending on the yarn brand you choose as well as your gauge when you crochet more info in the pattern * yarn needle to weave in ends you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet follow on instagram www instagram com/loopsandlovecrochet like on facebook and join the crochet group www facebook com/loopsandlovecrochet
